  • *Description**
Identifies and resolves the complex technical issues with current products or qualifies enhancements to existing or modified product configurations. The incumbent performs comprehensive tests using advanced experimental design and analyzes results using sophisticated statistical data analysis, effectively resolves complex technical problems and utilizes the scientific method as the foundation for problem solving. The incumbent exhibits excellent written and oral communication skills with an ability to promote and debate key issues. The incumbent plans and priorities daily, weekly, and monthly work assignments, leads and participates on several process improvement teams and problem solving efforts. The incumbent participates on technology transfer teams, presents and discusses technical and critical non-technical aspects of assignments with peers, or upper level positions, works effectively with all level positions within and outside the department, unifies team efforts, resolves conflict with team or project issues presenting only critical issues to upper level positions, for resolution, tactfully and responsibly. The incumbent is sensitive to project priorities and their impact on the immediate business unit as well as corporate goals and objectives and ensures customer needs are met.
